name: altusbot-template
description: Runs a Webex Teams bot on Heroku.

PUBLIC_URL.description: Internet facing URL where your bot can be reached.

BOT_TOKEN.description: The API access token of your Webex Teams bot.

API_BASE_URL.description: The base URL of the external API.

API_USERNAME.description: The API username (if the external API uses basic auth).

API_PASSWORD.description: The API password (if the external API uses basic auth).
